Reviews.Title: Basic camera
Reviews.Author: Igor Zaychik "We love it."
Reviews.Content: I purchase this camera for my 8 year son.It is difficult to break this cameraIn half of the cases it produces good quality pictureseven though default setting is 1.3M pic..Camera has very small screen and optical viewfinder.It doesn't need windows driver for loading picturesuses standard USB cable, can make .avi video.I used 2 rechargeable AAA battery but it lasts say 30 min..I recommend it for children and basic photography.

Reviews.Title: Maybe good for kids
Reviews.Author: gooch98
Reviews.Content: This camera takes okay snapshots and video, Not high quality by any means, but it does work. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: great kids camera
Reviews.Author: Kristie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son he loves it and it is easy for him to use.The batteries last about 45 minutes if he is using it non stop.I was very happy with this product

ProductInfo.Features:
4x digital zom, sharp 3 megapixel images, and digital camera, video camera, and pc webcam all in one
tripod socket, SD memory slot holds up to 1 GB (card required but not included), and a color preview screen
viewfinder, and ten second self timer
Breakaway neck strap, and only uses 2 AAA alkaline batteries (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Trekker Digi Camera - Green (DV
